sources.title: Dear Mr. Wonderful (1982)
sources.description: Ruby Dennis is an middle-aged man with an unfulfilled ambition as a singer. As he begins to pursue that ambition, his family falls apart. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dear-mr-wonderful-1982/

metadata.Plot: Joe Pesci is a small man looking for a big break. Owner of a bowling alley and nightclub in Jersey, Ruby Dennis (Pesci) sets his sights on making it big in Vegas. But Ruby finds more than he gambled for and in the end is a much bigger man for it.
metadata.Actors: Joe Pesci, Karen Ludwig, Frank Vincent
